messages.subject: Live & Learn funshop presenters
messages.msgSnippet: I m finalizing website pages---well *starting* to *begin* website pages for funshop presenters. Finalize is a long way away, I guess!  I m sending this
messages.messageBody:
I'm finalizing website pages---well *starting* to *begin* website pages
for funshop presenters. "Finalize" is a long way away, I guess! <g>

I'm sending this out to the all the different groups as well as
individuals to make sure I don't miss anyone.

If you've offered to host a funshop, please e-mail me as soon as
possible with your photos, your 4-5 line bio, your funshop title, and
its description. If you can't get a photo to me that soon, fine. But
please send everything else!

I really appreciate your promptness. Contracts will go out as soon as I
have your info.

Thanks so much!

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
October 6-9, 2005
http://liveandlearnconference.org
